1.title: Storylines and character's

12.content:
Let's go over some possible scenarios

A couple of cute campers find themselves abducted.

A lady taking a moonlight stroll gets beamed up.

An aspiring astrologer finds more than she bargained for.

An inebriated girl walks home after a wild party only to find her night is yet to be over.
12.title: Your storyline your character or characters

choices: The girls awaken in test tubes
They regain consciousness to find themselves strapped down
Abby's back at camp but Carmen is missing
121.content:
Two ladies trek their way through the forest in hopes of finding a suitable spot to camp under the shining stars. The campers were two friends in their early twenties named Carmen and Abby. Carmen, far more energetic than her companion, was a bit of an fitness junkie. From daily habits such as nutritious eating and exercise to outdoor activities, Carmen embodied health. Abby on the other hand was much more mellow. Though still slim and healthy, she simply did not possess the same affinity Carmen had for fitness and such found herself getting dragged into activities.

"Just a little further..." promised the toned Carmen.

"Ughhh you keep saying that." whined Abby.

"Ah ha here we are." announced Carmen swinging her arms open. "Take a gander at the great outdoors Abby."

Abby lacked the enthusiaism of her friend which clearly manifested in her lethargic response "Yeah... it sure is breathtaking."

"Don't be sarcastic." Carmen snapped.

The two then began to set up camp. Taking far longer then expected, the girls were relieved that they finished before the sun set. Despite having an athletic body, Carmen lacked the experience of a typical camper which made the venture somewhat bumpy. Carmen had intended to gather food from the wild but completely failed. Luckily Abby planned ahead and brought tons of snacks which Carmen found underwhelming.

"Yuck you eat that garbage?" Carmen gagged digging through Abby's backpack.

"Oh come on they're just nutri-bars." Abby reasoned.

"Oh really?" Carmen held out a bag of marshmellows.

"I figured we'd make s'mores."

Abby's words were met with an unamused glare. "You know that's how girls like you get fat."

"I guess." Abby pouted. "But what will we eat? You couldn't catch any animals or even find any berries."

"We can go without dinner, we did eat a large lunch before setting out." Carmen suggested.

Eventually Carmen capitulated after Abby's endless complaints and indulged in the nutri-bars with Abby though to Abby's dismay they did not have s'mores.

Before they knew it darkness had crept over them.

"Well guess it's time to sleep." Carmen said as the two of them crawled into their sleeping bags.

Before they fell asleep they gazed upon the star-light sky finding all of the stars impressive. There were so many more lights in the sky when one leaves the city. The girls delighted as they found all of the pretty constellations and big glowing stars. One in particular was rather bright, and seemed to get brighter.

"Hey is it me or is that star getting bigger?" Carmen asked

"Oh my it is getting bigger. And brighter!" Abby's voice spoke with alarm.

"I think it's coming at us!" Carmen loudly worried.

Suddenly the two ladies were engulfed in a blinding light. Little did they know that they had just been abducted by a spacecraft under the control of the Chubby Primary.
121.title: The Camping Trip

1213.content:
Abby found herself lying on the ground confused and hungry, very hungry.

"Uh what happened? Carmen do you know wha- Carmen? Carmen?" Abby darted her head back and forth in search of her friend.

"Carmen where are you?!" Abby yelled.

Abby ran through the trees desperate to find her friend.

"Carmen! Carmen!" Abby cried out.

Unable to find Carmen, Abby grew frightened and oddly.. hungry. Clutching her adamant stomach, Abby pressed on calling out for her missing friend. Making matters worse, Abby was quickly becoming exhausted. Running was putting an immense strain on the scared girl. Concern for her friend was suddenly accompanied by thoughts of food.

"Huh this isn't the time to think about food!" Abby said to herself.

"Carmen!"

'GROWLLLL.' Abby's shouts were followed by her roaring stomach.

Abby fell to the ground, far too tired and too famished to run. It was then that Abby heard an odd noise close by. Heaving her worn out body up, Abby forced her way to the rustle. As Abby walked closer the noise became more recognizable, like loud eating. Approaching the noise Abby thought it was a large animal greedily eating a huge meal. Abby was shocked to see the source of the loud chewing noises.

"C-Carmen?" Abby uttered.

Sitting before Abby was her friend, Carmen. However Carmen looked far different than her usual fit toned self. Here was the previously restrained Carmen wildly stuffing her face with desserts. Dumbfounded as to how those sweets got there in the first place, Abby was even more freaked out by Carmen's body. No longer thin and athletic, Carmen was now ....
1213.title: Abby's back at camp but Carmen is missing

choices: Caressa woke up in a high tech cell
Caressa woke up in her bed. It must've been a dream...
She found herself in an alien world
She found herself in the main lobby of a spaceship
13.content:
Caressa stood at her booth. Another day, another conference, another 3 hours of telling college students her age to sign up for a program that she spokes-personed for. She sighed as it was slow as usual.

Looking around, they seemed more interested in businesses that helped out with parties, making money doing odd jobs, and new apartments. It showed how little they cared about their finances, "This is the job I took though..." Caressa huffed adjusting her designer beanie and smoothing her pitch black hair.

Hours passed by and very few people passed. None payed any attention or seemed to care. It was just another one of those conferences. At the sight of the clock striking three, she began to pack up her things. The untouched pamphlets, stickers, pens, and notes. All scooped into a bag and ready to be displayed out next conference. Which happened to be in just a few days, "Goodie..." Caressa muttered entering her car and getting the hell off of the college campus.

The whole drive she muttered to herself. Why did she ever settle for such a boring job? Clearly she could do better. Caressa hated the person who talked her into taking this job. Even worse, she hated to be the person that would talk other people into taking this job. She was just growing more and more furious.

Suddenly, a flash of blinding light came from above. She partially covered her eyes to keep her sight on the road, but to her amazement the road seemed to get further and further away from her. She screamed and cried in panic as the car was lifted closer and closer to the spaceship. Caressa thought about jumping out of the car, only if it weren't to result in immediate death. Blindness and the white light came over her. The next thing she knew...
13.title: Your storyline your character or characters

15.title: Possible alternative base story ideas

151.content:
Eons ago, lived an alien determined to preserve the universal beauty known as female obesity. Huge breasts, round bellies, wobbly thighs, and swollen buttocks surpassed all other qualities in femininity. If these immaculate traits were to ever fall in danger, beauty itself would perish. Resilient, the alien constructed an AI spaceship programmed to protect full figured femininity for all time. The spaceship valiantly watches from space, ready to pounce should beauty becomes misguided.

Sitting in space, the spaceship sees an unsettling development. Human women are foolishly shedding beautiful pounds. Humanity had lost its way and women ignore their instincts of plump ravenous bodies in favor of shriveled, unhealthy bodies. Deception had gripped girls into exercise and dieting, practices unbefitting any lavish lady. To the spaceship's concern, the female population was becoming slimmer.

Preparations were made. Inhabitable bases were set up throughout the solar system to house rescued women. Advanced technology graced said bases capable of catering to any woman's needs.

Ready to save beauty the spaceship approached Earth, hovering closely above its inhabitants.

The first woman abducted was...
151.title: Protector of Beauty

choices: Sharon finds herself floating towards it
1511.content:
Sharon was a 150 pound woman. Naturally her body was a voluptuous 180 pounds however, society had pressured the poor girl into losing weight. Depriving herself from needed food and torturing herself with unpleasant exercise, the beautiful woman had unfortunately succeeded and shrunk. Sharon hated the whole experience and deep down loved her curves but others had tricked her into self loathing.

"Oh why am I fat?" pouted Sharon grabbing two handfuls of her paunch with her hands.

"I just have to be thin. Thin like those women on tv."

Sharon tied her long blonde hair in a ponytail and pulled on a tight sports bra over her ample breasts. Wearing a pair a flimsy gym shorts, Sharon observed pockets of cellulite on the back of her fat thighs.

Sharon sighed "It's like my body doesn't want me to slim down."

As the sun set, Sharon went out to jog. She waited til dark to jog because she didn't want people to see her gelatinous flesh jiggle in tight clothing. Sharon refused covering her soft belly, running in a shirt was too uncomfortable so she only wore a sports bra letting her belly go bare. As visibility diminished, Sharon set off. Immediately her body quaked and rippled.

"Huff huff Come on Sharon keep it up." she told herself tolerating her boobs bobbing up and down.

The unnecessary exercise caused Sharon's lungs to burn. Her joints hurt and all she could think about was food. Her body was telling her to stop and go replenish the lost calories. Demented by society's destructive influence, Sharon continued her jog, until a mysterious light hovered over her.

Wh- what is that? Am.. I... seeing things? Maybe (pant) I really am overdoing it." Sharon out of breath said between gasps.
1511.title: A chunky jogger

info.brief_description: A mysterious spaceship makes young adult human females swell in pleasure and weight gain
info.description:
Please read this carefully before continuing

these interactive stories "The Chubby Primary" "The Chubby Admirer Program" and "Spaceship of Weight Gain"

Are my original ideas so please do not make them your own, you may add chapters if you so choose

I will not edit your chapters unless they validate the rules that I have given.

I intend to combined

"The Chubby Primary" "The Chubby Admirer Program" and "Spaceship of Weight Gain" Into a unique single chubby admirer novel

____________________________________________________________________________________________________

The base background story
for The Spaceship of Weight Gain

The same entity a different reality the chubby primary as a mysterious artificial sentience of a spaceship.

A unique unregistered spaceship with regarded artificial sentience obsessed with the fetish of chubby chasing.

Primary obsessed with young adult human females willingly or forcefully growing into immobile versions of themselves.

Lurks in the shadows of space as well the any life supporting planet primary among the planets of the solar system of earth.

With the intent to lure young adult human females one at a time or in groups into itself and make them grow into regarded immobile versions of themselves.

In the process of becoming its absolute obedient servants

will it be stopped?
____________________________________________________________________________________________________

Now for rules please follow

rule one
moaning in sexual pleasure while in the process of weight gain and becoming completely nude is allowed

rule two
health and beauty with strength to move is to increase not decrease

rule three
there is to be no death and no other version of expansion. outside of weight gain

rule four
no becoming shapeless blobs of fat
